name: Cavern of illusions
description:
Cavern of illusions is an atmospheric hardcore platformer prototype.

It was created in one month for the Indie Game Making Contest 2018.

Controls: Controller (reccomended):
  • Move - left stick
  • Jump - A
  • Teleport - hold B

Not tested on ps4 controller, but Jump - X, teleport - O might work.

Mouse and keyboard:
  • Move - asd / arrow keys
  • Jump - w / up arrow key
  • Teleport - hold left click

Teleport needs to be unlocked.

Developement details:

The game was created in the Unity game engine.

Unity packages used in the project:
  • Anima2D (Unity essentials) - used for skeletal animations on the player character.
    https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/essentials/unity-anima2d-79840
  • Cinemachine (Unity essentials) - used for smooth camera movement and transitions.
    https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/essentials/cinemachine-79898
  • Easy sound manager (Hellmade games) - used for faster and easier playing of music and sounds.
    https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/audio/eazy-sound-manager-71142
  • Tween (Digital Ruby) - used for simple tween animations on floating rocks and platforms
    https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/animation/tween-55983
Other assets:

Sounds from Medieval Fantasy SFX Pack, Inventory SFX Bundle, Magic Spells SFX Bundle by EvilMind (https://www.gamedevmarket.net/asset/medieval-fantasy-sfx-pack-1061/, https://www.gamedevmarket.net/asset/inventory-sfx-bundle-4864/, https://www.gamedevmarket.net/asset/magic-spells-sfx-bundle-3639/)

Additional sounds and music from Pro Sound Collection by GamemasterAudio (https://www.gamedevmarket.net/asset/pro-sound-collection-6169/)

All other assets were created by me during the jam.
